features: OMNI-TECH: Our proprietary technology provides air-permeable protection that's waterproof and breathable, keeping mother nature's elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.

WARM SNOW BIBS: Durable and warm, these full length snow bibs are insulated with 100 grams of breathable and quick-drying polyester and will definitely keep the snow from getting in. Perfect for long days in the cold white fluff.

KEEPS THE SNOW OUT: Perfect for skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, or any other snowbound sport, our Adventure Ride Snow Bibs are critically seam sealed to keep dry or wet snow out, and include internal leg gaiters to keep your feet comfortable and dry.

HANDY FEATURES: Ready for alpine action these winter bibs include waist adjustable tabs, a cargo pocket, internal leg gaiters, reinforced knees, seat, and cuff guards, while adjustable suspenders provide a wide range of fit and activity.
EXTENDED FIT: Designed for youth, these snow pants feature our OUTGROWN grow system that makes it easy for the pants to adjust to their growth spurts and extend the life of the garment.
title: Columbia unisex-child Adventure Ride Bib
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Sport Specific Clothing › Skiing › Boys › Bibs & Pants › Bibs
description: A performance ready set of snow bibs, the Columbia Youth Adventure Ride Snow Bibs utilize our Omni-TECH waterproof and breathable materials. A full length bib set, they are fully insulated to keep youth warm, happy and dry. With adjustable suspenders and our OUTGROWN grow system, this garment will size up for multiple seasons of wear. Warm and well insulated for cold snowy days utilizing 100g of insulation, these bibs include a cargo pocket, adjustable suspenders, and quick adjust waist tabs. To help lock the snow out, they feature internal leg gaiters with silicone grippers at the leg openings, and our durable Hammerhead reinforced knees, seat and cuff guards. Columbia offers these youth sized bibs in multiple colors and sizes. Regular Fit. To ensure you get the right size, please refer to our sizing chart to find your child’s proper height and measurements.

features: OMNI-HEAT: Our patented Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for outdoor performance. The interior lining consists of our metallic dot pattern designed to retain heat, while the breathable fabric dissipates moisture

OMNI-SHIELD: Go ahead, try and get dirty. Omni-Shield helps you stay clean and dry by resisting the absorption of liquids. Unlike most fabrics that absorb moisture, Omni-Shield repels moisture and dries quickly—avoiding stains and keeping you clean

COZY WINTER JACKET: The Columbia Women’s Mighty Light Hooded Jacket is a performance blend of advanced water repellency and ultra lightweight warmth that only our thermal heat reflective lining can provide. Your go-to coat for a wide range of adventure. Center back length: 34 inches

HANDY FEATURES: This coat includes comfort cuffs with thumb holes to keep your hands warm and yet in control. A two way center front main zipper and 2 zippered hand pockets, while an interior security pocket keeps small items stowed safely

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching and craftsmanship. This is a long-lasting winter jacket you will enjoy for seasons to come
Hips : Measure around the fullest part of your hips.
title: Columbia Women's Mighty Lite Hooded Jacket
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Women › Clothing › Coats, Jackets & Vests › Down Jackets & Parkas
description: This long hooded jacket is an essential in the cold season, with a stain and water resistant shell, lightweight insulation, and our signature thermal-reflective lining, you’ll stay cozy warm and dry while on the go. The Columbia women’s Mighty Lite Hooded Jacket offers the perfect blend of heat retention across a mix of outdoor climates. The long outer shell is infused with Omni-Shield technology to repel water and stains, while the insulation and Omni-Heat thermal reflective lining will keep you warm. With a full two-way zippered front you'll find maximum flexibility for range of motion and warmth control. The zippered side pockets and internal security pocket will keep your small items secure, including hands — a comfortable coat for most cold Fall, Winter or Spring days. Columbia offers this jacket in multiple colors and sizes. Active Fit. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the sleeve. If you come up with a partial number, round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.

features: WATERPROOF SNOW PANTS: Lined with a comfortable taffeta, these pants are made from 100% Nylon Hydra Cloth 3000 fabric, these snow pants will shield you from the wet — during extended time in the snow.
WARM INSULATION: Durable and warm, these snow pants are insulated with 60 grams of our Microtemp XF II insulation, made from a quick-drying polyester. Perfect for long days in the cold white flakes.

KEEPS THE SNOW OUT: Perfect for skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, or any outing in the white fluff. Our Columbia Women’s Modern Mountain 2.0 Snow Pants are designed to keep you warm, dry, and comfortable all day.
HANDY FEATURES: Ready for alpine action these snow pants include two zippered front pockets, an adjustable waist, internal leg gaiters, with lower leg snap gussets, and reinforced cuff guards.

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart from others. We use only the highest quality materials, expert craftsmanship, and durable stitching. This is a worry-free garment you will enjoy for seasons to come.
title: Columbia womens Modern Mountain 2.0 Pant
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Sport Specific Clothing › Skiing › Women › Bibs & Pants › Pants
description: A durable pair of snow pants, the Columbia Women’s Modern Mountain 2.0 Snow Pants are warmly insulated, designed for skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, or just having fun on the mountain, you’ll feel comfortable and warm all day in these waterproof and breathable snow pants. Lined with comfortable nylon taffeta, that includes 60 grams of quick drying insulation, perfect for cold snowy days, these snow pants include two front pockets, an adjustable waist, internal leg gaiters, with snap gussets, and reinforced cuffs. Columbia offers these women’s snow pants in multiple colors and sizes. Extended sizing available. Active Fit. To ensure you get the right size, please refer to our sizing chart. To measure the waist correctly, measure around your natural waistline, allowing the tape measure to sit comfortably. For the hips, measure around the fullest part of your hips. And for the correct inseam, measure from the top of the interior leg to the bottom of the ankle.

features: OMNI-TECH: Our proprietary technology provides air-permeable protection that's waterproof and breathable, keeping mother nature's elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.

ALL-WEATHER RAIN PANTS: Designed to keep you shielded, the Storm Surge Waterproof Rain Pants are critically seam sealed and feature our advanced waterproof coated nylon — exactly what you need in the middle of any downpour.

WET WEATHER COMFORT: More than just a cold shell, these storm pants feature a mesh lining for a touch of extra warmth and comfort you'll appreciate over shorts or other undergarments on damp chilly days.

HANDY FEATURES: These wind and rain proof pants come with essential climate controls, like a drawcord adjustable waist and cuff tab adjustable leg openings keeping your warm while locking the elements out.

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart from others. We use only the highest quality materials, expert craftsmanship, and durable stitching. These are worry-free rain pants you'll enjoy every time you head out into the storm.
title: Columbia Women's Storm Surge Pant
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Women › Clothing › Active › Active Pants
description: These flattering and fully seam sealed pants feature our waterproof and breathable technology. They're ideal for outdoor enjoyment especially in the wettest of conditions. The Columbia Women’s Storm Surge™ Waterproof Rain Pants are a little slice from a dry oasis found in the middle of a deluge. Expect solid rain protection for outdoor activities in wet weather. Our Omni-TECH™ nylon sheds moisture while allowing warm air to escape, along with built-in mesh lining to keep you comfortable when intensity rises. The drawcord waist and tab adjustable leg cuffs ensure the elements are locked out for all day comfort. Columbia offers these women’s winter waterproof pants in two colors and multiple sizes. Available in extended sizing. Regular Fit. To ensure you get the right size, please refer to our sizing chart. To measure the waist correctly, measure around your natural waistline, allowing the tape measure to sit comfortably. For the hips, measure around the fullest part of your hips. And for the correct inseam, measure from the top of the interior leg to the bottom of the ankle. Imported. Shell: 100% nylon. Lining: 100% polyester. Cinched waistline. Machine Wash.Inseam: 29" Short / 31" Regular.

features: WATERPROOF SNOW PANTS: Lined with a comfortable taffeta, these pants are made from 100% Nylon Hydra Cloth 3000 fabric, these snow pants will protect from even the wettest of snows.
WARM INSULATION: Durable and warm, these pants are insulated with 60 grams of our Microtemp XF II insulation, that's quick-drying and excellent for long days in the cold white flakes.

KEEPS THE SNOW OUT: Great for early skiers, snowboarders, or just all-around play in the fun white fluff... our Ice Slope II Snow Pants are designed to keep little ones warm, dry, and comfortable all day.

HANDY FEATURES: Ready for alpine action these snow pants include two front pockets, a cargo pocket, adjustable waist tabs, internal leg gaiters with reinforced cuff guards – designed for durability and extended activity.
EXTENDED FIT: Designed for youth, these snow pants feature our OUTGROWN grow system that makes it easy for the pants to adjust to their growth spurts and extend the life of the garment.
title: Columbia boys Ice Slope Ii Pant
breadCrumbs: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry › Boys › Clothing › Active › Active Pants › Track Pants
description: A durable pair of pants, the Columbia Boys’ Ice Slope II Waterproof Snow Pants are warmly insulated to keep your little tykes happy and dry throughout hours of play. With our adjustable OUTGROWN grow system, this garment will size up for multiple seasons of wear. Lined with comfortable nylon taffeta, that includes 60 grams of quick drying insulation, perfect for cold snowy days,. These snow pants include two front pockets, a handy cargo pocket, an adjustable waist with quick tabs, internal leg gaiters, and reinforced cuff guards. Columbia offers these pants in multiple colors and sizing. To ensure you get the right size, please refer to our sizing chart for your child’s size and weight range.
